name: Space Raider (seagull743, PeetThun, Oden037, KerbertDaFrog, JimBloB, DucatiDan990, dodecahedron-12)
name_original: Space Raider (seagull743, PeetThun, Oden037, KerbertDaFrog, JimBloB, DucatiDan990, dodecahedron-12)
description:
You are a Space Raider tasked with exterminating an extraterrestrial threat that has invaded your planet. 

It is your mission to find their leader and reclaim a powerful crystal that they have stolen.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows - Moving Mouse 1 - To Shoot
  • R - Switch Firing Mode
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • E - Interact
